title: 80: Am I Bi?
itunes:title: 80: Am I Bi?
description:
The Broads have an open and personal conversation about Bisexuality and more.
Articles discussed in episode: 
https://www.refinery29.com/en-us/what-is-bi-curious-meaning
https://www.buzzfeednews.com/article/michaelwaters/lgbt-rights-movement-sexual-fluidity-bisexuality-pride
And chart discussed is: The More Complicated Attraction Layer Cake by Luna Rudd
